channel.title: Mothership: The Mystery of the Somnus
channel.description:
***Mothership*** is a [free-to-play](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/245017/Mothership-Players-Survival-Guide) sci-fi horror roleplaying game where you and your crew try to survive in the most inhospitable environment in the universe: outer space! In this one-shot adventure, we'll be playing the module *Ghost Ship* from the wonderful Dissident Whispers pack.
This event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct will be in play and safety tools including Open Door, Lines & Veils, and the X-Card will be used.
[date=2021-04-28 time=18:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-04-28 time=22:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MYWQYrtkbBn89_uBEAr)
